AUTOPLAY_PAGE.title: Autoplay description
AUTOPLAY_PAGE.description: The autoplay function shows the description and they plays the corresponsing scene

LANGUAGE.not_found_more: We are looking for volunteers to translate the platform, our goal is to spread this application all over the planet. Please contact us at feedback@videoforblind.com

VIDEO_SEARCH.welcome: Welcome to the Video For Blind application!
VIDEO_SEARCH.title: Search videos
VIDEO_SEARCH.lead: Type the name of the video, or paste a YouTube URL, then click on the start search button. You can see the latest videos as well below the search area.
VIDEO_SEARCH.label: Video title or URL

LOGIN.title: Login
LOGIN.soon_text: You cannot login at the moment, we are currently implementing Google and Facebook logins

ABOUT.about_text: Video For Blind is a platform that has a clear goal, to open a new world for blind people by allowing them to watch videos. TBD.

SEARCH.request: Do you want to request a narration for this video?
